Name: Bearable
Description: A symptom tracking app for chronic illness that allows users to log symptoms, medications, and lifestyle factors. Users report abandoning it due to time-consuming logging processes and lack of actionable insights beyond data collection.

Name: MyFitnessPal
Description: A fitness and health tracking app that uses gamification features like streaks and achievements to boost user retention and engagement.

Name: Visible
Description: A health tracking platform designed for people with chronic illness, mentioned by its founder in community discussions about symptom tracking tools.

Name: Guava
Description: A symptom tracking app used by patients to track cycles and prepare for pain, helping users identify patterns in their chronic illness symptoms.

Name: Daylio
Description: A mood and activity tracking app compared to CareClinic, used for mental health and daily wellness monitoring.

Name: CareClinic
Description: A comprehensive health tracking app that allows users to track symptoms, medications, and labs over time for chronic condition management.

Name: Medisafe
Description: A medication management and health tracking app compared to CareClinic, focused on medication adherence and health monitoring.

Name: myGoalNav Dementia
Description: A symptom tracking platform designed specifically for caregivers and patients with dementia and mild cognitive impairment to track symptoms and challenges.
